titles.title: A bill to restore the traditional observance of Memorial Day and Veterans Day.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S561)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

bill.summary: 1/21/1993--Introduced. Changes the legal public holiday designated as Memorial Day from the last Monday in May to May 30th. Authorizes and requests the President to issue a proclamation calling upon the people of the United States to observe Memorial Day and Veterans Day as days for prayer and ceremonies showing respect for American veterans.
